          </h2>

      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17309566">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17309566">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309566">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find current news from the country I am researching?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309566">
          <div id="boxatt17309566" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25514132">
              <a id="link_25514132" href="https://news.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25514132,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25510237}); ">
               Google News
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search or browse across many news sites simultaneously.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20383346">
              <a id="link_20383346" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383346,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369574}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Contains press releases from most countries, or the region where a country is located.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17309568">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17309568">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309568">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly books and articles on my topic?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309568">
          <div id="boxatt17309568" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20383308">
              <a id="link_20383308" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383308,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. All disciplines represented. English language only.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20383387">
              <a id="link_20383387" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383387,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19721252}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Includes scholarly journals, but also non-scholarly trade magazines and business news magazines. English language only.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25514004">
              <a id="link_25514004" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25514004,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20383390">
              <a id="link_20383390" href="http://www.google.com/books" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383390,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378397}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free. Interdisciplinary. Request on interlibrary loan books not available full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20383306">
              <a id="link_20383306" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383306,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free. Interdisciplinary. Request on interlibrary loan articles not available full text. Spanish and English.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25514116">
              <a id="link_25514116" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25514116,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717130}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309631">

           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How about trade and specialty publications?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309631">
          <div id="boxatt17309631" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20383407">
              <a id="link_20383407" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383407,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. All disciplines represented. English language only.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20383409">
              <a id="link_20383409" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383409,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19721252}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Includes scholarly journals, but also non-scholarly trade magazines and business news magazines. English language only.
              </div>

           &nbsp;

          <h2>
           Government agency reports, trade association reports?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309569">
          <div id="boxatt17309569" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25514128">
              <a id="link_25514128" href="http://www.google.com/advanced_search" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25514128,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20431846}); ">

              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20383311">
              <a id="link_20383311" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383311,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19978738}); ">

              <div class="linkdesc">
               Advanced Google can limit to government or non-profit domain.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20383418">
              <a id="link_20383418" href="http://lanic.utexas.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383418,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20382175}); ">

       <div id="wrapbox17309666">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17309666">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309666">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I perform a statistical analysis of a country?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309666">
          <div id="boxatt17309666" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20383428">
              <a id="link_20383428" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383428,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808438}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Gives basic demographics of a country, plus overview of political system. Most recent year only.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20383433">
              <a id="link_20383433" href="http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/inter-natlinks/sd_natstat.asp" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383433,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904587}); ">
               National Statistical Offices
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A directory of statistical offices.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20383439">
              <a id="link_20383439" href="http://data.worldbank.org/indicator" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20383439,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Spanish for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904137}); ">
               World Bank
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Many demographic statistics, especially regarding wealth distribution. Choose the Data by Indicators, then click on the desired topic to get a complete list of countries.  Time series.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4698888" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17309570">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17309570">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309570">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>

          <p>
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Trexler Library's Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17309570" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
